listitem.para: Usage : Used to configure File types for bulk file upload with permissions.
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * KEY_1 - Bank Abbv Name - Determines Whether particular file type can be uploaded for the bank KEY_2 - Product Type - For Portal sub product code of FT (INT, DOM etc). This should be set as "*" for FLEXI mode. DATA_2 - Email 1 (Y/N) KEY_3 - Product Group - For portal sub product code for BK (COLLE - collections,PAYMT- Payments KEY_4 - Map Code - Actual Name of Map_ to be sent to Data mapper (nothing but FT),PAYRL - Payroll) DATA_4 - Phone (Y/N) DATA_1 - File Type - Type of the file to be uploaded. This is displayed for the customer based on permission (Payroll-INT Standard,payroll - INT Special etc) DATA_2 - Permission Name - Permission to display file type (ft_bulk_bp_ibg_std_upload etc) DATA_3 - Format Name in file system (SG_INT_PAY_COLL,SG_INT<PAY_WITH_Advice) DATA_5 - Format Type - Fixed or CSV will be passed to DataMapper (Fixed,CSV) DATA_6 - Header Account Level Flag (Y/N) - Field to specify whether account is mandatory while uploading DATA_7 - Header Value date Level flag (Y/N) - Field to specify whether value date is mandatory while uploading DATA_8 - Amendable (Y/N) DATA_9 - Multi Product Group (Y/N) DATA_10 - Multi Entity allowed (Y/N) N for Singapore DATA_11 - File Encrypted (Y/N) - File being uploaded in encrypted. DATA_12 - Payroll Type (Employee, Executive etc) DATA_12 - Compressed File Type DATA_13 - Fixed table for advise DATA_14 - Override Duplicate Customer Reference Check (Y/N) DATA_15 - Restrict from Merge.

listitem.para: Usage : This parameter is used for configuring the message sequence of incoming TMA messages to process it. From KEY_3 on wards the message types should be configured, along with unique identifier in DATA_3 on wards respectively Note that message types should be configured in asc order. If there is a event submitted from the Portal and it required some set of messages as response, we need to configure the pending message as well in the sequnece of parameter. DATA_2 should be Y for cases when there is action pending from the customer for an event. For example: An Initialbaselinesubmission(019) event submitted from FBCC requires 3 messages 001, 018, 010 from TMA hence in the parameter configuration requires 019 as well as one of the key.
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - company_id KEY_1 - product code KEY_2 - Event type KEY_3 - message type DATA_1 - actual message sequence to be processed as per the ISO standared, separated by delimiter ":" DATA_2 - Y/N - Whether this event requires any action(like accept/reject) from the portal side, based on which event in progress flad is set to "Y". eg: For a TMA initiated IO amendment, the buyer has to accept/reject the amendment, no other event should be allowed till this action is completed. The values is set as "Y", based on this condition, the TM master will be updated with event in progress flag. DATA_3 - Unique identifier for the message type in KEY_3 eg: 1. If message 015 has this as the identifier value "//SubmitrPropsdBaselnRef/Submitr/BIC_//SellrBk/BIC", both are xpaths in the xml message, and their values have to be same. 2. If message 011 has this as the identifier value "//RptTp/Tp_CURR://EstblishdBaselnId/AmdmntSeqNb_*", we have two conditions to validate, which are separated by a ":" a) value at xpath location //RptTp/Tp, in the message, should be equal to "CURR", b) value at xpath location //EstblishdBaselnId/AmdmntSeqNb, in the message, should not be null/empty.

listitem.para: Usage : This parameter used to configure the hours in report scheduling. If this parameter is configured it will enable to configure report at a particular hour and minute. Infact, it supports the configuration of maximum number of reports that a company can schedule as well number of records that a report can fetch from database.
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - company id of customer/bank/bank group to which the Report parameter is configured. KEY_1 - owner abbv name DATA_1 - Maximum number of reports that can configured for report scheduling(* - means no limit for the report scheduling) DATA_2 - Maximum number of records to be fetched from the report (*- means all records to be fetched from the report) DATA_3 - hours in 24 hours format separated by delimiter : in ascending order DATA_4 - Default hour.Warning - to be configured from one of the value in DATA_3 only

listitem.para: Usage : USed to Configure the account types shown in account summary automatically without going through user account set-up in customer side.
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - customer company id KEY_1 - Account_type ( Refer BusinessCodes for account type) Sample Script for account LA(Loan Account,account type='05') to be shown automatically in account summary: Insert into gtp_param_data (brch_code,parm_id,company_id,key_1,key_2,key_3,key_4,key_5,key_6,key_7,key_8,key_9, key_10,key_11,key_12,key_13,key_14,key_15,key_16,key_17,key_18,key_19,key_20,wild_card_ind,data_1,data_2,data_3, data_4,data_5,data_6,data_7,data_8,data_9,data_10,data_11,data_12,data_13,data_14,data_15,data_16,data_17, data_18,data_19,data_20) values ('00001','P371','*','**','05','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**', '**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**', '**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**','**');

listitem.para: Usage : Used to configure the table name and reference column for the product/transaction element product.
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: GTP_PARAM_DATA PARAM_ID - unique id COMPANY_ID - company id KEY_1 - product/transaction element product DATA_1 - master table name DATA_2 - master table reference column DATA_3 - transaction table name DATA_4 - transaction table reference column DATA_5 - transaction table reference column

listitem.para: Usage : Used to configure the different fscm program sub-types
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: GTP_PARAM_DATA PARAM_ID - unique id COMPANY_ID - company id KEY_1 - Bank KEY_2 - fscm program sub-type KEY_3 - sub-type category DATA_1 - description DATA_2 - Multiple Finance DATA_3 - Anchorparty DATA_4 - Counterparty DATA_5 - Invoice uploaded by DATA_6 - Invoice submitted by DATA_7 - Buyer acceptance required DATA_8 - Finance Request By DATA_9 - Finance Debit Party DATA_10 - Finance Credit Party DATA_11 - Finance Settled By DATA_12 - Residual Payment By DATA_13 - Principal Risk Party DATA_14 - Multiple Finance Allowed

listitem.para: Usage : Used to configure the credit account per bank for fees and charges- invoice payment.
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: PARAM_ID - unique id COMPANY_ID - customer company id KEY_1 - bank abbv name DATA_1 - credit account number DATA_2 - credit account currency

listitem.para: Usage : To Retrieve the back office based on product code and subproduct code and operation
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * KEY_1 - Product code KEY_2 - Subproduct code KEY_3 - Operation type DATA_1 - BackOffice name DATA_2 - Synchronous or Asynchronous

listitem.para: Usage : Used to configure Legal Text for a bank. This legal text is used in Lending Portal
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * KEY_1 - BANK_ABBV_NAME for bank specific or '*' to apply same legal text for all banks KEY_2 - FACILITY_TYPE eg:Use REV for REVOLVER type and TERM for TERM Facility type KEY_3 - TRANSACTION_TYPE eg:DRAWDOWN,REPRICING etc. DATA_1 - Localization Key to be used for picking legal text value, this key should be available in loan_*.properties file

listitem.para: Usage : Used to store the Bank Specific Payroll configuration created for Scheduled Reports. Client may use scripts to maintain the values.
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter, KEY_1 - bank_abbv_name DATA_1 - Y/N

listitem.para: Usage : This parameter used to configure the cross currency for standard payment. If this parameter is configured it will enable to configure cross currency per branch/bank.
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - company id of customer/bank/bank group to which the Cross Currency parameter is configured. KEY_1 - owner abbv name DATA_1 - Y/N(indicates enabled or disabled)

listitem.para: Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * KEY_1 - Category(for Bank: BK ,for client: CL) KEY_2 - Bank Name KEY_3 - Operation type DATA_1 - Number of days of inactivity DATA_2 - Email id mail to be send

listitem.para: Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * KEY_1 - Bank Name KEY_2 - Category(for Bank: BK ,for client: CL) KEY_3 - Operation type (R - Role Changes, P - Permission Changes) DATA_1 - Email id mail to be send

listitem.para: Usage : To configure possible reasons for getting HK RTGS Bank List
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - Company Id, KEY_1 -Bank BIC code, DATA_1 - Name, DATA_2 - Bank Name, DATA_3 - Bank Address Line1 , DATA_4 - Address Line2 Post Code, DATA_5 - Address Line3 City, DATA_6 - Address Line3 Branch, DATA_7 - Country , DATA_8 - Required Intermediary Bank(Y/N)

listitem.para: Usage : Used to configure getFee Calculation-Parameterization
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - default * KEY_1 - BANK_ABBV_NAME for bank specific or default '*' to apply same to all banks KEY_2 - PRODUCT_CODE KEY_3 - SUBPRODUCT_CODE KEY_4 - Payment System (defined in portal.properties) DATA_1 - CURRENCY DATA_2 - AMOUNT(threshold value above which service will be called))

listitem.para: Usage : Used to configure the custom widget for any dashboardType.
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: KEY_1 - dashboardType (global_dashboard, cash_dashboard, trade_dashboard, loan_dashboard, fscm_dashboard) DATA_1 - widget name(role name).

listitem.para: Usage : To retrieve Event types list.

listitem.para: Usage : To retrieve clearing code list for treasury-instructions

listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * LONG_DESC - Clearing code description(Used for treasury-instructions) SHORT_DESC - Clearing code Abbreviation CODE_VAL - Code for clearing code. PRODUCT_CODE - Product Code SUB_PRODUCT_CODE - Sub Product Code

listitem.para: Usage : To retrieve time frame list for listdef
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * LONG_DESC - Time frame description(eg. DAYS) SHORT_DESC - Time frame Abbreviation(eg. D/M/Y) CODE_VAL - Number of days/month/year. PRODUCT_CODE - Product Code SUB_PRODUCT_CODE - Sub Product Code

listitem.para: Usage : List of Payment Methods methods used for filtering out remittance instructions in Drawdown, Repricing and Increase Screens.

listitem.para: Usage : To retrieve Event types list for Product Code
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * LONG_DESC - Events Description (Ex: Issuance, Amendment, Message) SHORT_DESC - Events Short Description (Ex: ISSU, AMD, MSG) CODE_VAL - Product Status Code PRODUCT_CODE - Product Code SUB_PRODUCT_CODE - Sub Product Code

listitem.para: Usage : To retrieve types for Action Required List
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * LONG_DESC - Action Required Types Description (Ex: Consent Response etc) SHORT_DESC - Types Short Description (Ex: CONTRESP, AMDRESP etc) CODE_VAL - Action Type Code PRODUCT_CODE - Product Code SUB_PRODUCT_CODE - Sub Product Code

listitem.para: Usage : To retrieve types for Tenor Types List
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * LONG_DESC - Tenor Types Description (Ex: Sight etc) SHORT_DESC - Types Short Description (Ex: SIGHT, ACCPT etc) CODE_VAL - Tenor Type Code PRODUCT_CODE - Product Code SUB_PRODUCT_CODE - Sub Product Code

listitem.para: Usage : To retrieve sub product codes list for Product Code
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * LONG_DESC - Sub product codes Description (Ex: Trust Receipts, Import Loan Collection etc.) SHORT_DESC - Sub product codes Short Description (Ex: ITRPT, IBCLC etc.) CODE_VAL - Sub Product Code PRODUCT_CODE - Product Code SUB_PRODUCT_CODE - Sub Product Code

listitem.para: Usage : configure product models for UX screens
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - default * KEY_1 - BANK_ABBV_NAME for bank specific or default '*' to apply same to all banks KEY_2 - model type(FORM, SUBMIT, ENQUIRY, EVENT-DETAILS, API-MAPPING, SUBSECTION) KEY_3 - PRODUCT CODE KEY_4 - SUBPRODUCT CODE KEY_5 - Transaction type code KEY_6 - subtransaction type code KEY_7 - option KEY_8 - operation KEY_9 - mode DATA_1 - resource DATA_2 - action code DATA_3 - permission

listitem.para: Usage : To retrieve types for Term Codes List
Below are required key and data columns for configuring this parameter,
listitem.programlisting: COMPANY_ID - * LONG_DESC - Term Codes Description (Ex: Sight / Document Against Payment etc) SHORT_DESC - Term Codes Short Description (Ex: SIGHT, ACCPT etc) CODE_VAL - Term Codes Code PRODUCT_CODE - Product Code SUB_PRODUCT_CODE - Sub Product Code
